name: Paper Dreams (digitalwrites)
description:
A surreal platform game made by children and young people from Swindon, Wiltshire, UK

Explore the surreal worlds devised, drawn and designed by these young developers. Avoid the traps and collect points. Speak to the weird characters in these worlds and help them out by finding and returning the things they have lost.

Made by:

Archie, Ceici, Dougie, Isis, Juno, Laila, Lewis, Louie and Maylea;

Archie, Bradley, Harry, Honey, Jacob, Louie, Maddie and Oliver from Haydonleigh Primary School;

Alice, Grace, Imogen, Kieran, Maria, Nirvaan, Sophie and Wiktoria from Shaw Ridge Primary School;

Eliot from Priory College.

Funded by

Arts Council England, Haydonleigh Primary School, the parents of the home educated children, Priory College, Swindon Borough Council, Shaw Ridge Primary School.
